include / mprace

InterruptGenerator.h

00001 #ifndef INTERRUPTGENERATOR_H_
00002 #define INTERRUPTGENERATOR_H_
00003 
00004 namespace mprace {
00005 
00006 // This is needed to compile properly in x86_64
00007 typedef unsigned int * puint;
00008 
00016 class InterruptGenerator {
00017 public:
00018         InterruptGenerator(unsigned int *base, unsigned int *inte, unsigned int *ints );
00019         
00020         ~InterruptGenerator();
00021         
00022         inline unsigned int getAssertCount() { return *igan; }
00023         
00024         inline unsigned int getDeassertCount() { return *igdn; }
00025         
00026         inline void reset() { *igc = CTRL_RESET; }
00027         
00028         inline void setLatency(unsigned int nanoseconds) { *igl = (nanoseconds >> 2); }
00029 
00030         inline unsigned int getLatency() { return (*igl) * 4; }
00031 
00032         inline void enable() {
00033                 (*inte) = (*inte) | INTE_IG;
00034         }
00035         
00036         inline void pause() {
00037                 latency = this->getLatency();
00038                 this->setLatency(0);
00039         }
00040 
00041         inline void play() {
00042                 this->setLatency(latency);
00043         }
00044 
00045         inline void disable() {
00046                 (*inte) &= !(INTE_IG);
00047         }
00048 
00049         inline void ack() {
00050                 (*igc) = CTRL_ACK;
00051         }
00052         
00053 protected:
00054         const static unsigned int CTRL_RESET;   //** Reset Control word
00055         const static unsigned int CTRL_ACK;             //** Acknowledge Control word
00056         const static unsigned int INTE_IG;              //** Interrupt Enable bit
00057 
00058 private:
00059         volatile puint igc;             //** Pointer to the Control register
00060         volatile puint igl;             //** Pointer to the Latency register
00061         volatile puint igan;    //** Pointer to the Assert Counter
00062         volatile puint igdn;    //** Pointer to the Deassert Counter
00063         volatile puint inte;    //** Pointer to the Interrupt Enable register
00064         volatile puint ints;    //** Pointer to the Interrupt Status register
00065         
00066         unsigned int latency;   //** Saved latency value. Used by the pause/continue commands.
00067 
00068 };      // end class
00069 
00070 } // end namespace
00071 
00072 #endif /*INTERRUPTGENERATOR_H_*/
